name: Downtobid
headline: Using AI to understand construction plans faster.
description: Our product helps GCs automatically identify scopes of work, find qualified local subcontractors, and send personalized bid invites.

founders.name: Andy Lee, Founder
founders.description: Downtobid - AI to understand construction plans faster

founders.name: Kevin Wu, Founder
founders.description: currently building downtobid.  previously BCG. previously previously professional gamer.

# AI-Powered Tools for Construction Bidding
Whether you're sending bid invites or receiving them—Downtobid streamlines your bidding process with tools that deliver better results.
For General Contractors
Find and Invite Reliable Contractors
Connect with verified contractors anywhere you bid. Create and distribute bid packages in minutes.
[Learn More](https://downtobid.com/</bid-tool>)
![](https://downtobid.com/_next/image?url=%2Fdowntobid-dashboard.webp&w=3840&q=75)
For Trade Contractors
Track all your Bid Invites Effortlessly
Manage your bid invitations, deadlines, and communications in a single dashboard. All without manual data entry.
[Learn More](https://downtobid.com/</bid-board>)
![](https://downtobid.com/_next/image?url=%2Fbasis%2Fdashboard.webp&w=3840&q=75)
Trusted alternative to
![](https://downtobid.com/_next/image?url=%2Flogos%2Fbuilding-connected.webp&w=640&q=75)
![](https://downtobid.com/_next/image?url=%2Flogos%2Fsmart-bid.webp&w=828&q=75)
![](https://downtobid.com/_next/image?url=%2Flogos%2Fisqft.webp&w=640&q=75)
![](https://downtobid.com/_next/image?url=%2Flogos%2Fplanhub.webp&w=640&q=75)
![](https://downtobid.com/_next/image?url=%2Flogos%2Fprocore.webp&w=640&q=75)
![](https://downtobid.com/logos/the-blue-book.svg)
### Outdated Tools Cost General Contractors Time and Projects
Other platforms leave your team chasing bids and bogged down with administrative tasks. Downtobid solves these problems with faster responses, better trade coverage, and intuitive tools that streamline preconstruction for you and your trade partners.
![](https://downtobid.com/_next/image?url=%2Fdowntobid-dashboard.webp&w=3840&q=75)
### Subcontractors You Can Count On 57,000+ active profiles
Say goodbye to unverified data and mass-blasted invites. Downtobid connects you with pre-vetted subcontractors who actually respond—helping you target the right trades faster and with confidence.
### ITBs That Build Relationships 2x faster response rates
Stop sending ITBs that get ignored or buried in spam—Downtobid's personalized invites, automated follow-ups, and contractor-friendly planroom make it easy to engage and build better connections
### Coverage Anywhere You Bid 95% trade coverage
Expanding into new markets shouldn't mean stressing over gaps. We ensure comprehensive trade coverage, helping you grow without compromises.
### AI-Driven Planroom for Every Project
Our planroom automatically sheets and categorizes by scope, ensuring trade contractors can quickly find what they need.
[Discover ITB Tool](https://downtobid.com/</bid-tool>)
### Simplifying Bidding for Trade Contractors
Managing bids shouldn't mean chasing emails and missing deadlines. Downtobid's Bid Board automates data entry so you can focus on winning the jobs that matter.
Organize Your Bids in One Place
Stop juggling emails, spreadsheets, and platforms. Downtobid automatically captures all bid invites, consolidating them into a single, easy-to-use dashboard.
Respond Faster, Win More
Get real-time reminders for deadlines, track your responses, and stay ahead of the competition.
Insights That Matter
See which GCs are actively engaging with your bids and make smarter decisions to improve your win rate.
[Discover Bid Board](https://downtobid.com/</bid-board>)
![](https://downtobid.com/_next/image?url=%2Fbasis%2Fdashboard.webp&w=3840&q=75)
### How It Works
From finding contractors to managing responses, everything you need in one place.
For General Contractors
1
Find Verified Contractors
Access vetted trade partners in seconds
2
Send Smart ITBs
Create and distribute bid packages instantly
3
Track Coverage
Monitor responses in real-time
For Trade Contractors
1
Capture All Invites
One dashboard for all bid opportunities
2
Manage Deadlines
Never miss a bid deadline again
3
Track Performance
Improve your win rate with insights
### Success Stories
See how leading contractors are transforming their businesses with Downtobid.
George H. Pastor & Sons achieves 2x subcontractor responses with Downtobid's ITB Tool
Learn how G.H Pastor secured consistent coverage, sped up subcontractor responses, and cut back on admin work—all by using Downtobid's ITB Tool in one unified platform.
2xbroader coverage in new regions
50%faster response time from subs
10 hours/weeksaved on manual follow-ups
[Read Case Study](https://downtobid.com/</bid-tool/customer-stories/ghpastor>)
RTG Contractors reclaims their day and sends 2x more bids with Downtobid
See how RTG Contractors transformed hours of bid admin into more time for estimating and winning jobs.
3hours saved daily
2xmore bids completed weekly
100%job organization
[Read Case Study](https://downtobid.com/</bid-board/customer-stories/rtg-contractors>)
### Make bidding easier for everyone
[Try for free](https://downtobid.com/</free-trial>)Contact sales
Easily invite subcontractors to bid on your projects. Downtobid connects you with a verified network and simplifies the ITB process—helping you get faster, more reliable responses.
[Try for free](https://downtobid.com/<https:/downtobid.com/free-trial>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Downtobid**

Founded in 2019 and a proud member of Y Combinator's S19 batch, Downtobid is a New York-based company that is revolutionizing the construction bidding process using artificial intelligence. Their mission is simple yet ambitious: to help general contractors (GCs) and trade contractors understand construction plans faster and more efficiently.

**What They Do**

Downtobid offers a suite of AI-driven tools designed specifically for the construction industry. Their products include:

- **ITB Tool for Commercial GCs**: This tool simplifies the process for GCs to automatically identify scopes of work, send personalized invitations to subcontractors, and ultimately streamline bid management.
- **Bid Board for Commercial Trade Contractors**: A platform that allows trade contractors to manage all their bid invitations, deadlines, and communications, centralizing everything in one dashboard without laborious manual data entry.

The focus is on connecting GCs with vetted subcontractors, ensuring that invitations go out quickly and effectively, while also allowing subcontractors to respond with ease.

**Why Downtobid Stands Out**

In a market where outdated tools can cost general contractors time and frustrate project timelines, Downtobid offers a compelling solution. Their platform has over 57,000 active subcontractor profiles, simplifying the search for reliable partners and targeting bids more effectively. With features like automated follow-ups and a contractor-friendly planroom, their tools not only increase efficiency but also foster better relationships in the bidding process.

Downtobid is particularly attractive for those looking to optimize their time and bidding results. They boast double the response rates on invitations—the kind of leverage any contractor would want. They even offer 95% trade coverage, making expansion into new markets less daunting.

**The Team and Vision**

Based in New York with a dedicated team of five, Downtobid is guided by strategic insights and a vision to reshape the bidding landscape. Their group partner, Nan, adds weight to their growth ambitions. 

**Success Stories and Future Prospects**

Successes are already rolling in. Contractors using Downtobid report significant time saved, enhanced bid management, and increased opportunities. For instance, George H. Pastor & Sons doubled their subcontractor responses and cut down administrative hours drastically by leveraging Downtobid's tools.

The future looks promising for Downtobid as they continue to disrupt and elevate the construction bidding landscape with more innovations on the horizon. Curious about how these tools work in practice? You can explore them further on their website: [Downtobid.com](https://downtobid.com).

In short, if you’re a general contractor or trade contractor looking to streamline your bidding efforts and enhance productivity, Downtobid could be your next best move.
